synonyms.synonym: 59 kDa dystrophin-associated protein A1 acidic component 1

protein.specific_function: Adapter protein that binds to and probably organizes the subcellular localization of a variety of membrane proteins. May link various receptors to the actin cytoskeleton and the extracellular matrix via the dystrophin glycoprotein complex. Plays an important role in synapse formation and in the organization of UTRN and acetylcholine receptors at the neuromuscular synapse. Binds to phosphatidylinositol 4,5- biphosphate

reference.reference_text: Ahn AH, Freener CA, Gussoni E, Yoshida M, Ozawa E, Kunkel LM: The three human syntrophin genes are expressed in diverse tissues, have distinct chromosomal locations, and each bind to dystrophin and its relatives. J Biol Chem. 1996 Feb 2;271(5):2724-30.
